Package sample.presentation

Class OrdersWindow

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
sample.presentation.OrdersWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class OrdersWindow
extends javafx.stage.Stage
This UI class opens a window where the user can choose products and place an order
Since:
22.04.2021

  • Method Details

    • writeOrder

      public void writeOrder​(OrderBLL orderBLL, Product product, Client client, int quantity, int orderId)
      This method creates a new object of type Order and inserts it in the orders table in the database
      Parameters:
      orderBLL - an object of type OrderBll for performing the insert operation in the table
      product - an object od type Product that represents the ordered product
      client - an object of type Client that places the order
      quantity - an int representing the quantity of the product ordered
      orderId - an int representing the id of the order

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder()
      This method writes the bill of the order into a text file

    • addButtons

      public void addButtons​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Client> tableView, java.util.List<Client> listOfSelectedObjects)
      This method adds a new column to the table of clients. The new column contains buttons for selecting a client from the table.
      Parameters:
      tableView - the tableView we want to add the new column to
      listOfSelectedObjects - the list of selected customers updated in this method

    • addButtonsProductAdd

      public void addButtonsProductAdd​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Product> tableView)
      This method adds a new column to the table of products. The new column contains buttons for selecting products from the table.
      Parameters:
      tableView - the tableview we want to add the new column to

    • addButtonsProductRemove

      public void addButtonsProductRemove​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Product> tableView)
      This method adds a new column to a tableView. The new column contains buttons for removing the corresponding rows from the table.
      Parameters:
      tableView - the tableView we want to add the new column to
